fixes.name: Max Month
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR MaxDate = MAX('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date])
VAR StartOfMaxMonth = DATE(YEAR(MaxDate), MONTH(MaxDate), 1)
RETURN
IF(
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date] <= MaxDate &&
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date] >= StartOfMaxMonth,
    TRUE(),
    FALSE()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau LOD {MAX([Order Date])} to MAX('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]) and replaced DATE(DATETRUNC('month',[Max Date])) with DATE(YEAR(MaxDate), MONTH(MaxDate), 1). Column references were transformed to 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Order Date]. The calculation is a measure because it depends on an aggregation (Max Date).
